name: curseD Demons
description:
You are a demon cursed with the spirit curse that make you prisoned under the underworld, well, not any longer!

The demon king gives you the opportunity to get unused by executing other cursed demons by throwing them in THE HOLES, the only way to destroy them spirits.

Push enemies or hold them and throw them in THE HOLES.Jump over enemies to cross HOLES easily  and escape the big grouped amount of demons.

This game was made for the precise game jam 2020 under the theme of 'HOLES' by only me "Marouan Boufernana".

Hope you enjoy
